column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Modern and trendy atmosphere
column2: average service and pretty good food! The broth was rich and creamy and tasted delicious
column3: and the egg was cooked to perfection! The ramen noodles were also cooked well and had a great consistency and texture. Although our waitress forgot a part of our order and we were not checked up on that often
column4: it wasn't an unpleasant experience. Would recommend to others! Above average ramen in the Houston area!
